FirebaseSimpleLogin.!type: fn(firebase: Firebase, callback: fn(err: IFirebaseSimpleLoginError, user: IFirebaseSimpleLoginUser))

prototype.createUser: fn(email: string, password: string, callback?: fn(err: IFirebaseSimpleLoginError, user: IFirebaseSimpleLoginUser))
prototype.changePassword: fn(email: string, oldPassword: string, newPassword: string, callback?: fn(err: IFirebaseSimpleLoginError, success: bool))
prototype.sendPasswordResetEmail: fn(email: string, callback?: fn(err: IFirebaseSimpleLoginError, success: bool))
prototype.removeUser: fn(email: string, password: string, callback?: fn(err: IFirebaseSimpleLoginError, success: bool))
